Container.Name: RustDeskServer-AiO
Container.Overview:
Self-host your own RustDesk Server, it is free and open source.
This container includes both the RustDesk Server and the RustDesk Relay in one and starts it.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: Enable RustDesk Server
Config.Description: The server needs by default the following ports to work properly: TCP: 21115, 21116, 21118 UDP: 21116

Config.Name: Rust Desk Server Parameters
Config.Description: Enter your extra start up parameters for the server here if necessary.

Config.Name: Enabel RustDesk Relay
Config.Description: The relay needs by default the following ports to work properly: TCP: 21117, 21119

Config.Name: Rust Desk Relay Parameters
Config.Description: Enter your extra start up parameters for the relay here if necessary.

Config.Name: TCP - RustDesk Server/Relay
Config.Description: Necessary default ports for the server: TCP: 21115, 21116, 21118 UDP: 21116 Necessary default ports for the relay: TCP: 21117, 21119

Config.Name: UID
Config.Description: Only change when you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: GID
Config.Description: Only change when you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: DATA_PERM
Config.Description: Only change when you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Only change when you know what you are doing!
